DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to determine the prevalence of oral habits among primary Egyptian school children in Cairo Governorate, Egypt.
DOC.brief_title: The Prevalence of Oral Habits in a Group of Primary School Children in Cairo Governorate
DOC.detailed_description: This aim of this study is to determine the prevalence of oral habits among primary Egyptian school children in Cairo Governorate, Egypt. PICO: P: Egyptian primary school children of 7 - 10 years old O: Prevalence of oral habits Primary Outcome: Prevalence of Oral Habit; Device of Measurement: Questionnaire; Unit of Measurement: Binary.
DOC.criteria: Cooperative children of 710 years old Children with no intellectual problems Children with orthodontic appliances Medically compromised children Children of families who refuse to participate in the study
